_sText:
ze_timesplitters_v1_2

Visit - www.lagmasters.co.uk for more Source development work

#Version:
Version 1_2

#Map for:
Counter Strike Source - Zombie Escape

#Map Time:
Map is set for 8minutes

#Max Players:
64 (34 cts/30ts)

#Known Issues:
Can see Reaper Splitter Boss Arm Bones

#Additions:
Reaper boss cannot be hurt until he appears.
Reaper boss has +750 for every CT in the boss room.
Each Ct Killed by Reaper Boss, Boss -250hp.
Extra 3 way defence room, 40 Second Hold.
Reaper splitter targets players instead of following a path.
Few level tweaks 
Extra Hold
New boss health system

#Fixes:
CT's can hide in the corner and avoid the boss.
Being able to ride on top of the reaper splitters head.
Reaper Boss Movement.
Reaper Boss Targets T's
Tweaked platform at spawn to help stop edgers


#Future Additions and Fixes:
As of yet to decide, currently working on new map

#Important Notes:
You must have noblock mod installed on your server to play this map otherwise you will have serious problems with player teleports. USE NADES ON THE BOSS IT WILL HELP LOL

#Author:
Mononoke - Stephends

#References:
All timesplitters content is property of free radical entertainment. All content is property of their respective owners.

#Bugs:
If you find any bugs in this map please email a screen shot and detail of the bug to be credited in the next version. mononokie12@gmail.com

#Footer:
Any attempt to claim this map/edit/re-release/decompile is a act against my itellectual property rights and others, action will be sought.

#Credits:
Thanks you to Jason, Shaun, Alpharadia, Hannibal, Soja, Roy Halladay, Gargantua, Enviolinador and CZE Zombie Escape Server for all your help and support
Credits to Luffaren for the boss battle system
